text: Nantara jara ase kalale ki te doghe (saksi) ekha'adya aparadha'asa patra tharale aheta, tara asa lokampaiki jyancya virodhata gunha ghadala hota, anakhi dona vyakti, jya sarvanta javalacya asatila, jithe te doghe ubhe hote, tya jagi ya doghanni ubhe rahave, maga te allahaci sapatha ghetila ki amaci saksa ya doghancya saksipeksa adhika khari ahe. Ani amhi maryada para keli nahi ase kelyasa amaci ganana atyacari lokammadhye ho'ila
